name: renative-wrapper-app
description: ðŸš€ðŸš€ðŸš€ Build universal cross-platform apps with React Native. Includes latest `iOS`, `tvOS`, `Android`, `Android TV`, `Android Wear`, `Web`, `Tizen TV`, `Tizen Watch`, `Tizen Mobile`, `LG webOS`, `macOS/OSX`, `Windows`, `KaiOS`, `FirefoxOS` and `Firefox TV` platforms

scripts.bootstrap: npm run link && npx lerna bootstrap
scripts.bootstrap:clean: rm -rf ./node_modules; npx lerna clean --yes && npm run bootstrap
scripts.link: cd packages/rnv; yarn unlink 2> /dev/null; yarn link
scripts.publish: npm run prePublish && npm run publish:rnv && npm run publish:renative && npm run publish:hello && npm run publish:blank && npm run publish:sink
scripts.publish:alpha: npm run prePublish && npm run publish:rnv:alpha && npm run publish:renative:alpha && npm run publish:hello:alpha && npm run publish:blank:alpha && npm run publish:sink:alpha
scripts.publish:website: cd website && GIT_USER=pavjacko CURRENT_BRANCH=master USE_SSH=true npm run publish-gh-pages
scripts.rambo: rnv clean && npm i && rnv template apply --template renative-template-hello-world && npm run watch
scripts.run:apps: ttab rnv run -p web --ci && ttab rnv run -p ios -t 'iPhone 8' --ci && ttab rnv run -p android -t Pixel_2_API_28 --ci && ttab rnv run -p androidtv -t Android_TV_1080p_API_28 --ci && ttab rnv run -p tvos --ci && ttab rnv run -p macos --ci && ttab rnv run -p tizen -t T-samsung-5.5-x86 --ci && ttab rnv run -p webos --ci && ttab rnv run -p androidwear -t Android_Wear_Round_API_28 --ci && ttab rnv run -p tizenwatch -t W-5.5-circle-x86 --ci && ttab rnv run -p tizenmobile -t M-5.5-x86 --ci
scripts.sanity: rnv template apply --template renative-template-hello-world && rnv configure -c helloWorld --ci && npm run run:apps
scripts.start: concurrently "rnv start -p ios" "rnv start -p android" "rnv start -p androidtv" "rnv start -p tvos" "rnv start -p macos" "rnv start -p web" "rnv start -p tizen" "rnv start -p webos"

title: ReNative
